entities.description: The past 30 days timeframe referenced in the survey questions.
The frequency of using pain relievers not directed by a doctor in the past 30 days.
The frequency of using pain relievers without a doctor's direction in the past 12 months.
The frequency of using pain relievers in greater amounts than prescribed in the past 12 months.

relationships.description: Relates the survey to the past 30 days timeframe.
Indicates the frequency with which the respondent used pain relievers not directed by a doctor in the past 30 days.
Indicates the frequency with which the respondent used pain relievers without a doctor's direction in the past 12 months.
Indicates the frequency with which the respondent used pain relievers in greater amounts than prescribed in the past 12 months.
